roleset.name: subtract, take away
roleset.note: DEDUCT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deduct' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'subtract'. (from deduct.01-v predicate notes)
DEDUCTION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from deduction.01-n)

example.name: canonical
example.text: Tax-loss sellers, those investors who sell loss-making stocks so they can deduct their losses from this year's income, are also getting out, Mr. Mills said.
